alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Patrick (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Carroll and southwestern Patrick Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 657 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cana, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hazardous travel is expected along Interstate 77 in Virginia due to the combination of torrential rain and strong, gusty wind. Locations impacted include... Hillsville... Interstate 77 south of Mile Marker 12... Fancy Gap... Ararat... Cana... Laurel Fork... Lambsburg... and Gladesboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
